docs.title: STRUCTURE
docs.text: EVOAUTA (Shenzhen) Holding Co., Ltd.

docs.title: STRATEGIC LEVEL
docs.text:
• Chief Executive Officer (CEO): Vision | Outlook | Strategy
  • Chief Technology Officer (CTO): R&D | Products | Innovation
  • Chief Financial Officer (CFO): Finance | Fundraising | Risk Control
  • Chief Operating Officer (COO): Operations | Coordination | Support
  • Chief Marketing Officer (CMO): Marketing | Branding | Communication

docs.title: EXECUTIVE LEVEL
docs.text:
• Administration Team: Human Resources | Legal Compliance | Financial Management
  • R&D Team: Technology R&D | Product Development | Quality Assurance
  • Product Team: Product Planning | User Experience | Requirement Management
  • Operations Team: Daily Operations | Customer Service | Data Analysis
  • Marketing Team: Market Promotion | Brand Building | Public Relations Activities

docs.text:

  • Demand Mining and Supply Matching (Microservices Integration Platform)

docs.text: 进化体（深圳）科技有限公司

docs.title: 战略层
docs.text:
• 首席执行官（CEO）：愿景 | 视野 | 战略
  • 首席技术官（CTO）：研发 | 产品 | 创新
  • 首席财务官（CFO）：财务 | 融资 | 风控
  • 首席运营官（COO）：运营 | 协同 | 支撑
  • 首席市场官（CMO）：市场 | 品牌 | 传播

docs.title: 执行层
docs.text:
• 行政团队：人力资源 | 法务合规 | 财务管理
  • 研发团队：技术研发 | 产品开发 | 质量保障
  • 产品团队：产品规划 | 用户体验 | 需求管理
  • 运营团队：日常运营 | 客户服务 | 数据分析
  • 市场团队：市场推广 | 品牌建设 | 公关活动
